title.narrative: NATIONAL/SUB-NATIONAL CAPACITIES-DATA

description.narrative: Enhanced capacity of national and subnational entities in education planning, collection and use of data, system monitoring and budgeting, to provide equitable, inclusive and relevant education for all children and adolescents by 2021., which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Social Protection And Child Poverty. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, the most disadvantaged boys, girls and adolescents improved their education and developmental outcomes and access equitable and inclusive learning environments across the life cycle, including in emergencies.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Enhanced capacity of national and subnational entities in education planning, collection and use of data, system monitoring andbudgeting, to provide equitable, inclusive and relevant education for all children and adolescents by 2021.

description.narrative: UNICEF continues to support key evidence and policy recommendations to enhance the national capacities for early childhood development, prevention of malnutrition and education planning, monitoring and budgeting, with an emphasis on the most vulnerable children and adolescents. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:16/01/2022
